item.title: Beijing reports 1st omicron case ahead of Olympics...
item.description:
apnews.com
HONG KONG (AP) — Beijing has reported its first local omicron infection, according to state media, weeks before the Winter Olympic Games are due to start. The infected person lives and works in the city’s northwestern district of Haidian and had no travel history outside of Beijing for the past two weeks.
